original: Paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo cittavippayuttoti?
analyzed: ▁paññā ▁paññindriyaṃ ▁paññā bal aṃ ▁sammādiṭṭhi ▁dhamma vicay a sambojjhaṃg o ▁citt avippayutt oti

original: paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo cittasampayuttoti?
analyzed: ▁paññā ▁paññindriyaṃ ▁paññā bal aṃ ▁sammādiṭṭhi ▁dhamma vicay a sambojjhaṃg o ▁citt asampayutt oti

original: ñāṇaṁ saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannaṁ cittavippayuttaṁ, paññā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā cittasampayuttāti?
analyzed: ▁ñāṇaṃ ▁saṃkhārakkhandh apariyāpann aṃ ▁citt avippayutt aṃ ▁paññā ▁saṃkhārakkhandh apariyāpann ā ▁citt asampayutt āti
▁saṃkhārakkhandh o ▁ ekades o ▁citt asampayutt o ▁ ekades o ▁citt avippayutt oti
▁saṃkhārakkhandh o ▁ ekades o ▁citt asampayutt o ▁ ekades o ▁citt avippayutt oti

original: Vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho ekadeso cittasampayutto ekadeso cittavippayuttoti?
analyzed: ▁vedanākkhandho ▁saññākkhandho ▁ ekades o ▁citt asampayutt o ▁ ekades o ▁citt avippayutt oti
